flavors.name: Vanilla strawberry
flavors.description: A classic favorite with a rich, creamy vanilla flavor.

reviews.author: Alice
reviews.comment: Absolutely loved it! The best vanilla I've ever had.

flavors.name: Strawberry Delight
flavors.description: Fresh, fruity, and perfectly sweet strawberry ice cream.

reviews.author: Cathy
reviews.comment: Perfect for a summer day. Loved the fresh strawberry pieces!

flavors.name: Minty Fresh
flavors.description: A refreshing mint ice cream with chocolate chips.

reviews.author: Derek
reviews.comment: The mint and chocolate combo is simply divine!

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.comment: Very refreshing, but could use more chocolate chips.

flavors.name: Caramel Swirl
flavors.description: Creamy caramel ice cream with rich caramel swirls.

reviews.author: Fiona
reviews.comment: Caramel lovers rejoice! This is your dream ice cream.

flavors.name: Cookie Crumble
flavors.description: Vanilla ice cream loaded with cookie crumbles and chocolate chunks.

reviews.author: George
reviews.comment: Tasty, but I wish there were more cookie crumbles.

flavors.name: Pistachio Paradise
flavors.description: A delightful pistachio ice cream with a creamy texture.

reviews.author: Helen
reviews.comment: Pistachio perfection! The honey drizzle is a great touch.

flavors.name: Tropical Tango
flavors.description: A blend of tropical fruits like mango, pineapple, and coconut.

reviews.author: Ian
reviews.comment: A tropical vacation in every bite!

reviews.author: Judy
reviews.comment: Very refreshing, but a bit too sweet for me.

flavors.name: Rocky Road
flavors.description: Chocolate ice cream with marshmallows, nuts, and chocolate chunks.

reviews.author: Karen
reviews.comment: The perfect balance of textures and flavors!

flavors.name: Lemon Zest
flavors.description: A zesty and refreshing lemon ice cream with a tangy twist.

reviews.author: Leo
reviews.comment: Very refreshing, but a bit too sour for my taste.
